title: Valai Osai Kala Kala Kalavena Lyrics Sathya
stanzas: <div>Valai Osai Kala Kala Kalavena Lyrics Sathya

Valai osai kala kala kalavena
kavithaigal padikkuthu
kulu kulu thendral
kaatrum veesudhu.

sila neram silu silu silu ena
siru viral pada pada
thudikkuthu engum
dhegam koosudhu.

chinna penn pennalla
vanna poondhottam
kottattum maelamthaan
andru kadhal thaerottam.

Valai osai kala kala kalavena
kavithaigal padikkuthu
kulu kulu thendral
kaatrum veesudhu.

sila neram silu silu silu ena
siru viral pada pada
thudikkuthu engum
dhegam koosudhu.

oru kadhal kaditham
vizhi podum.
unnai kaanum sabalam
varak koodum.

nee paarkkum paarvaigal
poovaagum.
nenjukkul thaikkindra
mullaagum

kannae en kan patta kaayam
kaivaika thaanaaga aarum.
munnaalum pinnaalum
thallaadum
semmaeni en maeni
un tholil aadum naal.

Valai osai kala kala kalavena
kavithaigal padikkuthu
kulu kulu thendral
kaatrum veesudhu.

sila neram silu silu silu ena
siru viral pada pada
thudikkuthu engum
dhegam koosudhu.

chinna penn pennalla
vanna poondhottam
kottatatum maelamthana
andru kadhal thaerottam.

Valai osai kala kala kalavena
kavithaigal padikkuthu
kulu kulu thendral
kaatrum veesudhu.

Unnai kaanadhurugum
nodi neram.
pala maadha varudam
ena maarum.

neengaatha reengaaram
naanthaane
nenjodu nenjaaga nindrene

raagangal thaazhangal nooru
Raja un paer sollum paaru.
sindhaamal nindraadum
sendhaene
sangeetham undaagum
nee paesum paechilthaan.

Valai osai kala kala kalavena
kavithaigal padikkuthu
kulu kulu thendral
kaatrum veesudhu.

sila neram silu silu silu ena
siru viral pada pada
thudikkuthu engum
dhegam koosudhu.

chinna penn pennalla
vanna poondhottam

andru kadhal thaerottam.
